title: Information Security Analyst Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Cambridge University Press & Assessment
Interview Descriptions: The interview process is quite long and it will took several weeks and months before they will schedule an interview and another few weeks and months again before they will inform you about the result of the interview.
Interview Questions: Explain XSS attack and how to prevent it?

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Cambridge University Press & Assessment
Interview Descriptions: Interview Process was quick and the questions were very straightforward. The interviewers were kind and gave a lot of time for me to ask them questions as well. They explained the role well.
Interview Questions: What projects have you worked on?

title: Software Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Cambridge University Press & Assessment (Manila, Manila) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions:
Exam -> Tech Interview -> Final Interview

Exam:
2 algo problems and 1 sql problem. Done via MS Teams, you have to share your screen and solve the problems while being monitored.

Tech Interview:
Interview with the team lead, questions are mostly about your previous projects, technical questions about the technologies you've used, and some behavioral and situational. 

Final Interview:
Final interview is with the hiring manager from the UK. Mostly technical questions and situational.

HR peeps are very nice and accommodating, keeps me regularly updated about my application.
Interview Questions: Describe a time when you made a suggestion to improve something on the project that you were working on.

title: Junior Software Quality Analyst Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Cambridge University Press & Assessment
Interview Descriptions: They will text you and schedule you for an interview and send you a technical assessment and aptitude. They will call if you passed the exam and start with HR interview. If the team lead is available, they will proceed with Technical Interview and then Hiring manager
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself and goals

title: Senior Software Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Cambridge University Press & Assessment in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: Three part interview process, First part consist of a typical interview where you will be presented with introspective interpersonal questions, In the second part of the interview, you will be asked various analytical questions, very much like solving puzzles. Third part is where the technical interview comes in. I would seem like you are being gauged on you backgrounds on different technologies. particularly those written on your resume. There will also be a technical examination after the interview.
Interview Questions: How do you measure your success on a daily basis?

title: Senior Software Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Cambridge University Press & Assessment (Manila, Manila) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: There were 3 interviews and the types of questions that they asked were related to my resume and technical skills. There was an examination that was challenging and appropriate because it was a technical exam (Algorithms and SQL) and there was no nonsense examinations like vocabulary test.
Interview Questions: Why did you want to leave your current company?

title: Software Quality Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Cambridge University Press & Assessment (Makati City) in Jun 2018
Interview Descriptions:
The interview process was like this: HR Interview > Exam > Technical > Final Interview
It took a total of 2 weeks to close the offer.  The Job offer is sent digitally :)
Interview Questions: Focused more on the experience related to technical skills.
